package seleniumpackage;

import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.Select;

public class Seleniumprogram {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver", "G:\\Projects\\chromedriver_win32\\chromedriver.exe");
		WebDriver chrome=new ChromeDriver();
		chrome.get("https://demoqa.com/select-menu");
		chrome.manage().window().maximize();
		Select dropdown = new Select((chrome.findElement(By.id("cars"))));
			dropdown.selectByValue("volvo");
			dropdown.selectByVisibleText("Opel");
			dropdown.selectByIndex(3);
			dropdown.deselectByValue("audi");
										}
		
	}
